feed.title: Ananas Analytics Desktop Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Ananas Analytics Desktop news and events.

entry.title: Release Version 0.9.0
entry.summary:
From Ananas Desktop 0.9.0, you can use the new Web API data source to integrate web API into your current data analysis flow.

Web API data source automatically transforms returned JSON data into a data table, so that you can transform it using SQL as any other data sources.

entry.title: Release Version 0.8.2
entry.summary:
Version 0.8.2 is a bug fix release.

After publishing Ananas Desktop on Hacker News, we received a lots of constructive feedbacks, and valuable issue reports. Thanks a lot Hacker News for organizing such a great community.

In version 0.8.2, we mainly focus on Local CSV source related issues and feedbacks. More features will come in next feature releases soon.

entry.title: Release Version 0.8.1
entry.summary:
Version 0.8.1 is a bug fix release.

  • Support concat (union) up-to 5 inputs on one single concat step
  • fix Flink concat input types not match issue
  • change default gcs source and destination download sample size to 0 (no limit)
  • improve error message whe...

entry.title: Release Version 0.8.0
entry.summary:
We are proud to announce the first release of Ananas Desktop - a hackable data integration/analysis tool to enable non technical users to edit data processing jobs and visualise data on demand.

In the very first version, we support following features:
